EmailTemplate.name: Holiday Greeting 2012
EmailTemplate.subject: Season's Greetings from MBO Partners
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for offering us the opportunity to work with you throughout the year. We would like to wish you a joyous and memorable holiday season, with the hopes that the coming New Year continues to bring you happiness and success.
To view your e-card please click on the link below, or enter it into your browser.
